item.description:
From imdb.com: Colin Clark, an employee of Sir Laurence Olivier's, documents the tense interaction between Olivier and Marilyn Monroe during production of The Prince and the Showgirl.

This film has been praised by critics, and has a couple of Oscar nominations. Michelle Williams has a Best Actress nomination for her portrayal of Marilyn Monroe, and Kenneth has a Best Supporting Actor nomination for his portrayal of Sir Laurence Olivier.

My Week With Marilyn is showing at the West Boylston Cinema, which has $3 Tuesdays. Let's meet at 6:45 for the 7:15 showing. Anyone who wants to can join me at O'Connor's after the movie.

If you need to reach me, my cell phone number is 508-981-0455.

group.name: The Worcester Movie Fans Meetup Group

item.name: My Week With Marilyn
